mapper.select:
SELECT TWFPROCESSDEF.ID, TWFPROCESSDEF.CATEGORY, TWFPROCESSDEF.NAME, TWFPROCESSDEF.STATE, TWFPROCESSDEF.WFDID, TWFPROCESSDEF.SERVICETYPE, TWFPROCESSDEF.WFDKEY AS key, TWFPROCESSDEF.VERSION FROM WF_PROCESS_DEF TWFPROCESSDEF WHERE
AND TWFPROCESSDEF.ID = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO WF_PROCESS_DEF ( ID, CATEGORY, NAME, STATE, WFDID, SERVICETYPE, WFDKEY, VERSION ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{category}, #{name}, #{state}, #{wfdId}, #{serviceType}, #{key}, #{version} )
mapper.delete:
DELETE FROM WF_PROCESS_DEF TWFPROCESSDEF WHERE
AND TWFPROCESSDEF.ID = #{id}
mapper.update:
UPDATE WF_PROCESS_DEF TWFPROCESSDEF
CATEGORY = #{category,javaType=java.lang.String},
NAME = #{name,javaType=java.lang.String},
STATE = #{state,javaType=java.lang.String},
WFDID = #{wfdId,javaType=java.lang.String},
SERVICETYPE = #{serviceType,javaType=java.lang.String},
WFDKEY = #{key,javaType=java.lang.String},
VERSION = #{version,javaType=java.lang.String},
WHERE TWFPROCESSDEF.ID = #{id}
